import React from'react-dom';import{Link}from'react-router-dom';import blogpost from"../data/blog.json";import blogcategory from'../data/blogcategory.json';import blogtags from'../data/blogtags.json';import author from'../data/team.json';// Get Category
import{jsx as _jsx}from"react/jsx-runtime";import{jsxs as _jsxs}from"react/jsx-runtime";function getCategories(items){var elems=blogcategory.filter(function(item){return items.includes(item.id);});return elems;}// Tags
function getTags(items){var elems=blogtags.filter(function(item){return items.includes(item.id);});return elems;}// Client
function getAuthor(items){var elems=author.filter(function(item){return items.includes(item.id);});return elems;}function setCategoriesCount(){var _loop=function _loop(i){count=blogpost.filter(function(post){return post.categories.includes(parseInt(blogcategory[i].id));});count=count.length;blogcategory[i].count=count;};for(var i=0;i<blogcategory.length;i++){var count;_loop(i);}}setCategoriesCount();// Post details
function getBlog(id){return blogpost.filter(function(blog){return blog.id===parseInt(id);})[0];}// Pagination
function postnavigation(items,index){var output=[],id,item;if(items[index-1]!==undefined&&index-1!==-1){item=items[index-1];id=item.id;// Show the previous button 
output.push(/*#__PURE__*/_jsxs("div",{className:"prev-post",children:[/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("span",{children:"Prev Post"}),/*#__PURE__*/_jsxs(Link,{to:"/blog-details/"+parseInt(id),children:[item.title.slice(0,20)," "]})]},id));}if(items[index+1]!==undefined&&index<=items.length-1){// Show next button 
item=items[index+1];id=item.id;output.push(/*#__PURE__*/_jsxs("div",{className:"next-post",children:[/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("span",{children:"Next Post"}),/*#__PURE__*/_jsx(Link,{to:"/blog-details/"+parseInt(id),children:item.title.slice(0,20)})]},id));}return output;}// Filter
function getFilteredPosts(posts){var filter=arguments.length>1&&arguments[1]!==undefined?arguments[1]:{cat:'',tag:'',author:'',searchQuery:''};var catgoryFilter=filter.cat!==undefined&&filter.cat!==null&&filter.cat!=='';var tagFilter=filter.tag!==undefined&&filter.tag!==null&&filter.tag!=='';var authorFilter=filter.author!==undefined&&filter.author!==null&&filter.author!=='';var searchFilter=filter.searchQuery!==undefined&&filter.searchQuery!==null&&filter.searchQuery!=='';// Category filter
if(catgoryFilter){posts=posts.filter(function(post){return post.categories!==undefined&&post.categories!==null&&post.categories.includes(parseInt(filter.cat));});}// Tag filter
if(tagFilter){posts=posts.filter(function(post){return post.tags!==undefined&&post.tags!==null&&post.tags.includes(parseInt(filter.tag));});}// Author filter
if(authorFilter){posts=posts.filter(function(post){return post.author!==undefined&&post.author!==null&&post.author.includes(parseInt(filter.author));});}if(searchFilter){posts=posts.filter(function(post){return post.title!==undefined&&post.title!==null&&post.title.toLowerCase().includes(filter.searchQuery.toLowerCase());});}return posts;}export{getBlog,getCategories,getTags,getAuthor,getFilteredPosts,postnavigation};
